verbs.description: [ARG1: The U.S. Chamber of Commerce and the Republican Speaker of the House in Texas] [V: were] [ARG2: among those calling for an end to Trump 's border policy] .
The U.S. Chamber of Commerce and the Republican Speaker of the House in Texas were among [ARG0: those] [V: calling] [ARG1: for an end to Trump 's border policy] .
